attributes.action: ban or restrict the amount of publicity reality tv shows make from the tabloid press. (i.e. big brother always on the front pages and many more inside when more important news is going on!)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why are reality tv shows taking over the news coverage in this country, so much so that they have pages upon pages of coverage in the press and on the national news programs when if people are interested surly they can what the show.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
